data.title: Murata Manufacturing: Number of Employees 2013-2023 | MRAAY
data.meta_description:
Interactive chart of Murata Manufacturing (MRAAY) annual worldwide employee count from 2013 to 2023.
  • Murata Manufacturing total number of employees in 2023 was 73,164, a 5.69% decline from 2022.
  • Murata Manufacturing total number of employees in 2022 was 77,581, a 3.19% increase from 2021.
  • Murata Manufacturing total number of employees in 2021 was 75,184, a 1.45% increase from 2020.
  • Murata Manufacturing total number of employees in 2020 was 74,109, a 4.46% decline from 2019.
